ygData.subject: Re: Magical Gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: Unfortunatly only the Monks can use magic gloves and have the ability to punch magic only creatures.  It would be very nice if we had that ability. I have done
ygData.messageBody:
Unfortunatly only the Monks can use magic gloves and have the ability to
punch magic only creatures. It would be very nice if we had that ability.
I have done a lot of punching while using and instrument. Also it is not
so.

Mark

Amazing $14,000 Opportunity. Click below for details.
http://www.9898.com/mreed



I may be mistaken but I have elf-hide gloves and cannot punch a wisp for
damage.
So magic gloves are not the cure to punching magic critters.
BTW at 19 my H2H is maxed and it still sucks. Might have something to do
with only getting 3/level. I hear a lot of people say bards get 4 per or 5
per. Trust me... We get 3.
